0.3.name: wordpress/ssh-sftp-updater-support
0.3.description: Keeping your Wordpress install up-to-date and installing plugins in a hassle-free manner is not so easy if your server uses SFTP. "SSH SFTP Updater Support" for Wordpress uses phpseclib to remedy this deficiency.
